name: HKStatisticsOptions
desc: Options for specifying the statistic to calculate.

items.name: static var separateBySource: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the specified statistics separately for each source.

items.name: static var discreteAverage: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the average quantity for the samples.

items.name: static var discreteMin: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the minimum quantity for the samples.

items.name: static var discreteMax: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the maximum quantity for the samples.

items.name: static var cumulativeSum: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the sum of all the quantities for the samples.

items.name: static var mostRecent: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system returns the most recent quantity from the matching samples.

items.name: static var duration: HKStatisticsOptions
items.desc: An option indicating that the system calculates the total duration covering all the samples.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized statistics option using the provided integer.
